resource.description: AWS Route53 Recovery Control Routing Control resource schema .

properties.name: ControlPanelArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the routing control. You can use any non-white space character in the name.

type.description: The name of the routing control. You can use any non-white space character in the name.

attributes.description: AWS Route53 Recovery Control Routing Control resource schema .

properties.name: RoutingControlArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing control.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing control.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The deployment status of the routing control. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.

type.description: The deployment status of the routing control. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
